alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 2:46PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Franklin, southeastern Crawford and northeastern Sebastian Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 246 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Mountainburg to near Van Buren. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Alma... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Kibler... Concord... Jethro... Shibley... Barnes... Watalula... Piney... Toney... Vesta... Furry... Lonelm... Cravens... Paradise... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 6 and 33. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
